author: DANIEL ZELTER
subject: Maurice Leblanc's estate open to tourists
body:
I was searching for Arsene Lupin on the web, and I found 
www.arsene-lupin.com . The site gives you an option to read it in English 
btw. Anyway, I hope this is true.
